subject: Tennis
lead_paragraph: Daniela Hantuchova, who called the 107-degree-heat at the first women’s semifinal at the Pacific Life Open “very, very difficult,” won against Li Na, 7-5, 4-6, 6-1.
snippet: Daniela Hantuchova, who called the 107-degree-heat at the first women’s semifinal at the Pacific Life Open “very, very difficult,” won against Li Na, 7-5, 4-6, 6-1.
